pageDescriptionGlobal: Track USD (Blue & Oficial - Buy/Sell) and EUR (Official - Buy/Sell) exchange rates against Argentinian Peso (ARS) for a selected date.
headerSubtitle: View US Dollar (Blue & Oficial - Buy/Sell) and Euro (Official - Buy/Sell) for selected date in Argentinian Pesos (ARS).
calendarFooterNoDate: Pick a day for exchange rates.
noExchangeRateDataGeneric: No exchange rate data currently available for the selected criteria for {{date}}.
noExchangeRateDataSpecific: No exchange rate data found for {{currency}} on {{date}}.
pleaseSelectDay: Please select a day from the calendar to fetch rates.
dataNotAvailableOnDate: No data available for {{currency}} on this date.
toastNoValidDateDescription: Please select a valid date to fetch currency data.
toastInvalidYearDescriptionFuture: Cannot select future years. Displaying current month.
toastInvalidYearDescriptionPast: Year cannot be before {{year}}. Displaying earliest available month.
toastInvalidMonthDescriptionFuture: Cannot select future months. Displaying current month.
toastInvalidMonthDescriptionPast: Month cannot be before {{monthYear}}. Displaying earliest available month.
historyNoDataText: No historical data available for the last 10 business days.
